select.if: select rr.* from (select rownum rnum, r.* from (select u.*,d.u_detail_type ,(select count(*) from board_report r where u.u_no=r.u_no) reported ,(select count(*) from board_post p where u.u_no=p.u_no ) board ,(select count(*) from crew_entry c where u.u_no=c.u_no ) crew ,(select count(*) from roadmap ro where u.u_no=ro.u_no ) roadmap from user_info u ,user_detail d where u.u_detail_no=d.u_detail_no order by u_name) r ) rr where ceil(rnum/#{limit})=#{page}

choose.when: select rr.* from (select rownum rnum, r.* from (select u.*,d.u_detail_type ,(select count(*) from board_report r where u.u_no=r.u_no) reported ,(select count(*) from board_post p where u.u_no=p.u_no ) board ,(select count(*) from crew_entry c where u.u_no=c.u_no ) crew ,(select count(*) from roadmap ro where u.u_no=ro.u_no ) roadmap from user_info u ,user_detail d where u.u_detail_no=d.u_detail_no and u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' order by u_name) r ) rr where ceil(rnum/#{limit})=#{page}
choose.otherwise: select rr.* from (select rownum rnum, r.* from (select u.*,d.u_detail_type ,(select count(*) from board_report r where u.u_no=r.u_no) reported ,(select count(*) from board_post p where u.u_no=p.u_no ) board ,(select count(*) from crew_entry c where u.u_no=c.u_no ) crew ,(select count(*) from roadmap ro where u.u_no=ro.u_no ) roadmap from user_info u ,user_detail d where u.u_detail_no=d.u_detail_no and ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' order by u_name) r ) rr where ceil(rnum/#{limit})=#{page}

choose.when: select count(*) from user_info where u_id like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or u_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from user_info where ${category} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

mapper.select: select u.*,d.u_detail_type ,(select count(*) from board_report r where u.u_no=r.u_no) reported ,(select count(*) from board_post p where u.u_no=p.u_no ) board ,(select count(*) from crew_entry c where u.u_no=c.u_no ) crew ,(select count(*) from roadmap ro where u.u_no=ro.u_no ) roadmap from user_info u ,user_detail d where u.u_detail_no=d.u_detail_no and u_no=#{u_no}
mapper.update: update user_info set u_detail_no=9 where u_no=#{u_no}
mapper.select: select b.b_name as item_name, count(b.b_name) as item_count from board b,(select ( select c.b_no from board_cate c where c.b_cate_no=p.b_cate_no) b_no,p.* from board_post p) c where b.b_no=c.b_no group by b.b_name union all select '회원' as item_name , count(*) as item_count from user_info where u_detail_no=1 union all select '로드맵' as item_name , count(*) as item_count from roadmap_detail union all select '크루' as item_name , count(*) as item_count from crew
select to_char(c_apply_sdate,'yyyy-mm') item_name,count(*) as item_count from crew group by to_char(c_apply_sdate,'yyyy-mm') order by item_name
select to_char(r_detail_startdate,'yyyy-mm') as item_name ,count(*) as item_count from roadmap_detail group by to_char(r_detail_startdate,'yyyy-mm') order by item_name
